org.apache.flink.hadoopcompatibility.mapred.record

Class HadoopDataSource<K,V>

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.flink.api.common.operators.Operator<OUT>
      • org.apache.flink.api.common.operators.base.GenericDataSourceBase<Record,T>
        • org.apache.flink.api.java.record.operators.GenericDataSource<HadoopRecordInputFormat<K,V>>
          • org.apache.flink.hadoopcompatibility.mapred.record.HadoopDataSource<K,V>
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Visitable<Operator<?>>

    public class HadoopDataSource<K,V>
extends GenericDataSource<HadoopRecordInputFormat<K,V>>
    The HadoopDataSource is a generic wrapper for all Hadoop InputFormats. Example usage: 
                    HadoopDataSource source = new HadoopDataSource(new org.apache.hadoop.mapred.TextInputFormat(), new JobConf(), "Input Lines");
                org.apache.hadoop.mapred.TextInputFormat.addInputPath(source.getJobConf(), new Path(dataInput));
    Note that it is possible to provide custom data type converter. The HadoopDataSource provides two different standard converters: * WritableWrapperConverter: Converts Hadoop Types to a record that contains a WritableComparableWrapper (key) and a WritableWrapper * DefaultHadoopTypeConverter: Converts the standard hadoop types (longWritable, Text) to Flinks's Value types.
